text:
A complaint has been filed against Udhampur BJP leader Jagtar Singh Bajwa, after he was allegedly caught on tape asking the country’s youth “to decapitate Rahul Gandhi and hang his head on JNU’s gate” three days ago, police said on Tuesday.

Mr. Bajwa has been booked on charges of giving a speech with intent to instigate and cause riot, Bajpur police head O.P. Sharma said.

Officials are examining the video and audio of Mr. Bajwa’s speech, police said. - PTI
title: BJP leader booked for hate speech against Rahul
